name: drawIndexedPrimitives(_:indexCount:indexType:indexBuffer:indexBufferOffset:instanceCount:baseVertex:baseInstance:)
desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of primitives using an index list specified in a buffer, starting from the base vertex of the base instance.Required.
declaration:
func drawIndexedPrimitives(_ primitiveType: MTLPrimitiveType, 
                indexCount: Int, 
                 indexType: MTLIndexType, 
               indexBuffer: MTLBuffer, 
         indexBufferOffset: Int, 
             instanceCount: Int, 
                baseVertex: Int, 
              baseInstance: Int)
